title.rendered: Air Zimbabwe Airport Office in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe

content.rendered:
Air Zimbabwe (Pvt) Ltd is the national carrier of Zimbabwe, it was established in 1967, headquartered on the property of Harare International Airport, in Harare. From its hub at Harare International Airport, the carrier used to operate a network within southern Africa that also included Asia and London-Gatwick. Following financial difficulties, Air Zimbabwe ceased operations in late February 2012.

 

Air Zimbabwe Bulawayo, Zimbabwe Address:
J.M. Nkomo Airport, Bulawayo Airport
Bulawayo, Zimbabwe

Phone:
+263-9-290103

Working hours

Air Zimbabwe Official website: http://www.airzimbabwe.aero/

Air Zimbabwe Online Check-in: www.airzimbabwe.aero/online check-in

Note:Check In Domestic Flight: Check in at least 1 and a half hours before departure. International Flight: Check in at least 2 hours before departure.

Check Air Zimbabwe schedule here: www.airzimbabwe.aero/flight schedule

Check Air Zimbabwe flight status here: www.airzimbabwe.aero/flight status

Air Zimbabwe Baggage Allowance

Air Zimbabwe Baggage

View Air Zimbabwe Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Air Zimbabwe Cargo Office:

Air Zimbabwe Cargo transports general cargo, perishables, live animals, dangerous goods, medicaments and special commodities.

Air Zimbabwe ground handling agents contact details

Air Zimbabwe Cargo office in Harare, Zimbabwe

National Handling Services (Pvt) Ltd
P.O. Box AP191
Harare Airport

Emails: cargomanifest@nhszim.com; cargooperations@nhszim.com

Cargo Imports: + 263 778 946 393 / 86 4407 2271
Cargo Exports: + 263 778 946 392 / 86 4407 2270

Air Zimbabwe Cargo office in South Africa

South Africa
Bidair Cargo
OR Tambo International Airport
Foreign Airline Cargo Section
Unit 6
Republic of South Africa

Fax: +2711 390 2950

Import & Export Supervisor

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Rainbow Club
